title: Does anyone know what typeface this is? It is from an Atsuki Kikuchi piece
content:
Hi, What the font comes up with the wrong face for this. Most unique character from the 6 shown here is the 'N'. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713220428im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_003_6695.jpg)
author: For2Points

comments.content:
Possibly a modification of [Emigre Modula](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713220428/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/modula/).

- Mike Yanega
Thanks Mike. This is a good lead, although if this is correct there would be a lot of modification. I wonder whether it is customised font not released?
This is a customized font for [Aomori Museum of Art](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713220428/http:/www.aomori-museum.jp/en/index.html)
